justification: Improving air quality can have a positive impact on terrestrial ecosystems restoration in agricultural ecosystems by reducing pollution and promoting healthier ecosystems. This can lead to increased biodiversity and improved soil health.

Improving soil health can have a positive impact on terrestrial ecosystems restoration in forests by promoting sustainable forest management practices and reducing soil degradation. This can lead to increased biodiversity and improved ecosystem services.
